Share By nayrb23
Recently Expired Chick-fil-A Coupons
Chick-Fil-A-FREE Breakfast Entree-Select Cities Reserve Your FREE Breakfast Entree. Click on one of the locations if you'd like to make a reservation for an upcoming FREE breakfast entrées event being hosted by your local [...] Chick-Fil-A Calendar Just $6: Full of Freebies If you love Chick-fil-a as much as I do you may want to swing in your local location and snag one of these calendars.They are full of freebie coupons. Here's what the calendar contains: January: FREE Chick-Fil-A Nuggets, 8-count. February: FREE Small Bowl of Hearty Breast of Chicken Soup [...] DFW Readers: Get 4 FREE Chick-Fil-A Breakfast Items during October Head over to any Chick-Fil-A in the Dallas/Ft. Worth area to request a FREE "Fall in Love with Breakfast" card. You will get to use this card every week for the next 4 weeks to get the following items completely free: Week 1: Chick-n-minis. Week 2: Sausage Biscuit. Week 3: Chicken Biscuit. Week 4 [...] Chick Fil A - FREE Breakfast (Sign-ups Starting August 29th!) Free Chick Fil A?? Woohoo!! Head over to the Chick Fil A website on Monday August 29th to sign up for a day to go get your FREE Chick Fil A Breakfast!! You'll be able to pick any day between September 6th and 10th to go grab your free breakfast. And, I've posted this video [...] Free Breakfast with Reservation Make a reservation online and get a free breakfast entree at participating restaurant. Reservations available between September 6th and 10th, while supplies last. One free entree per reservation see site for details. July 8 Chick Fil A Cow Appreciation Day For one day only, black and white spots, cow bells and furry ears will be appropriate attire in the nation's second largest chicken chain. In celebration of July 8, Cow Appreciation Day, an unofficial – yet nationally recognized holiday, Chick-fil-A will award a free combo meal (breakfast, lunch or dinner) to any customer who comes [...] Chik-Fil-A: FREE Sweet Potato Fry Day on May 13, 2011 I am not sure if this is a National deal, but it certainly seems to be a Philadelphia-area deal! Stop by Chick Fil-A on May 13, 2011 and you can get a FREE medium order of Sweet Potato Fries when you mention that you are there to give them a try. As always, you want [...] FREEBIE: Monday Free Breakfast at Chick-Fil-A (Edmond Rd and Bryant) Tomorrow is the last day to get FREE Breakfast at Chick-fil-A . One Chicken Biscuit per customer tomorrow morning from 6:30-10:30 at the Edmond Rd. and Bryant location. Just ask for it at the drive through or dine in! I believe the other location in Edmond will be participating as well. Be sure to Like [...]
Comments about deals at Chick-fil-A Have something to say about deals at Chick-fil-A? Latest Blog Posts
Fast Food Food Stamps, Booze on the Burger King Menu and Other Marketing Mistakes
By pmiller at 10:54AM,
a year ago | under Newsworthy Photo courtesy of Ted Murphy , via Flickr
Last week, Savings.com blogger Allegra clued us into KFC's misguided attempt to do something nice: selling huge sodas for a diabetes charity . Needless to say, their move did not not create the desired reaction, and laughs were had by (nearly) all.
Well, it's another week, and the trend continues as various purveyors of junk foods run afoul of the media. Read on to discover my personal favorites.
Going Out to Dinner Cheaply, Without Looking Cheap
By brwood at 10:45AM,
5 months ago | under Money Saving Tips Valentine's Day is fast approaching. Once again I'm gonna share with you some of my secrets. Firstly, you can start with the tips from last year here . Follow up with my sure fire anniversary tips here . Then hit the jump for a recent discovery my wife clued me in on that will let you save up to 1/2 off you restaurant tab and make you look better, not worse in your date's eyes. Celebrating New Year's Eve 2012 For Less
By SavingsIQ at 7:58AM,
6 months ago | under Money Saving Tips Now that Christmas is over, it's time to ramp up for the other big celebration: New Year's Eve. We know that restaurants and bars take advantage of this holiday by raising prices on dinners and drinks and calling them "package deals" Some people can afford it and are willing to go all out on December 31st, but others are looking for something low-key and low-cost.
If you're in the latter group, I've got some ways that you can celebrate NYE without breaking the bank. Cheapskate's Guide to a Wedding Anniversary
By brwood at 8:56AM,
6 months ago | under Money Saving Tips So it's my third wedding anniversary tonight. We got married just two days after Christmas in a lovely snow covered little chapel in New England. It was beautiful, but now we are stuck celebrating our anniversary every year after already blowing our money on presents for everyone else.
And so we usually have very little to spend on each other.
Avoiding Black Friday Mania with Restaurant Gift Card Bonus Deals
By brwood at 8:57AM,
8 months ago | under Spotlight Deals I shop online all day long with Savings.com, and occasionally I actually leave the house to buy things locally. But from Thanksgiving till Christmas I try to avoid the crowds at the stores as much as possible. And let's face it, there are plenty of people in this modern world who are not really friends or family members but who you feel compelled to get gifts for. Find Restaurant Coupons, Deals and Other Ways to Save Money While Eating Out
By SavingsIQ at 9:54AM,
8 months ago | under Money Saving Tips Who loves food? Who loves dining out at new restaurants? Who loves saving money while doing so? Well, I'm here with some sites that are all about helping you eat out for less. One even gives you cash back! I've written about free apps for foodies and fine dining without breaking the bank .
This week I've got some new foodie sites for you. Have something to say about deals at Chick-fil-A? Leave a comment. Similar Stores Offer: Restaurant Coupons Google Offers Coupons More About Chick-fil-A Chick-fil-A sometimes offers coupons like these:
